title: GAYLA GUYSE NAMED GENERAL MANAGER OF EXCITING NEW OMNI FORT LAUDERDALE HOTEL
subtitle: In a significant move for the hospitality industry, Gayla Guyse has been appointed as the General Manager of the newly opened Omni hotel in Fort Lauderdale. Her extensive experience in hotel management is expected to bring fresh perspectives to the establishment. This appointment marks a promising beginning for the hotel as it aims to redefine luxury accommodations in the area.
content:
DALLAS, TX (December 3, 2024) – Omni Hotels & Resorts is excited to announce the appointment of Gayla Guyse as the General Manager of the upcoming Omni Fort Lauderdale Hotel, marking the brand’s third property in Florida. With over 25 years of dedicated service and operational excellence at Omni, Guyse brings extensive leadership experience to the hotel, which is set to open in Fall 2025.

The new 29-story hotel will be directly connected to the Broward County Convention Center, positioning it as one of the premier convention venues in the country following its renovation and expansion. The property will feature 801 guest rooms, 82 suites, nine food and beverage outlets, a vibrant rooftop bar, a sprawling pool, a full-service spa, and a fitness center.

Moreover, the hotel will boast over 120,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor meeting and event space, including a 30,000 square foot Waterway Ballroom, a 15,000 square foot Port Everglades Ballroom, and 27 breakout rooms, along with multiple pre-function meeting spaces offering waterfront views.

In her new role, Guyse will lead the hotel’s opening and manage all departments, including operations, sales and marketing, rooms, risk management, and food and beverage. Vince Parrotta, Chief Operating Officer at Omni Hotels & Resorts, stated, “We're continually working to ‘grow the garden’ by investing in the right talent who will empower teams and prioritize personal growth within the company.”

Parrotta added that Gayla’s strategic insights and consistent performance have been crucial to her advancement at Omni, and they are eager to have her lead the brand's introduction to Fort Lauderdale.

Guyse has held key leadership roles at several Omni properties throughout her career, including serving as General Manager of Omni Dallas Hotel at Park West and Director of Sales & Marketing at Omni Frisco Hotel at The Star. Most recently, she excelled as General Manager at Omni Frisco Hotel at The Star for over two years.

Prior to that, she managed Omni Houston Hotel, overseeing both the Houston property and Omni Houston Hotel at Westside during a pivotal transition period.

More information about the Omni Fort Lauderdale Hotel can be found at omnihotels.com
